Assertion.name: gml:name and gml:description
Assertion.shortDescription: gml:name and gml:description are not used
Assertion.expression: let $featuresWithErrors := $features[gml:name or gml:description][position() le $limitErrors] return (local:statistics-info($featuresWithErrors), for $feature in $featuresWithErrors order by $feature/@gml:id let $text := 'The object has gml:name or gml:description.' return local:object-message($feature, $text))

Assertion.name: CRS is RD (EPSG:28992)
Assertion.expression: let $featuresWithErrors := $features[//@srsName[.!='http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/28992' and .!='EPSG:28992' and .!='urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::28992']][position() le $limitErrors] return (local:statistics-info($featuresWithErrors), for $feature in $featuresWithErrors order by $feature/@gml:id let $text := concat('CRS ',data(($feature//@srsName[.!='http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/28992' and .!='EPSG:28992' and .!='urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::28992'])[1]),' is not correct or not correctly formatted. Should be: http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/28992, EPSG:28992 or urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::28992.') return local:object-message($feature, $text))
